apps.name: NotifyKit
apps.subtitle: Custom notifications via Shortcuts
apps.localizedDescription:
NotifyKit integrates with iOS Shortcuts to let you send fully customizable notifications.

Features:
• Full text customization (title, subtitle, body)
• Badge number control
• Multiple sound options
• Image attachments from URLs
• Thread grouping
• Interruption levels (Passive, Active, Time Sensitive)
• Action buttons (Reply, Snooze, Mark Read)
• Schedule notifications for later
• Cancel pending notifications

Shortcuts Actions:
• Send Notification
• Schedule Notification
• Send Notification After Delay
• Cancel Notification
• Cancel All Notifications
• Set/Clear App Badge
• Get Pending Count

versions.localizedDescription: Initial release with full notification customization and Shortcuts integration.
